typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
TCrossReference filter(code_type_id == 106 && target_code != 'PI') ~> FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode
FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode aggregate(groupBy(target_code = target_code),
	target_description = first(target_description)) ~> AggregateTargetCode
AggregateTargetCode sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		top_description as string,
		grp_key as string,
		grp_description as string,
		top_id as decimal(28,10),
		bua_description as string,
		bus_key as string,
		bua_id as decimal(28,10),
		bua_key as string,
		top_key as string,
		grp_id as decimal(28,10),
		bus_description as string,
		bus_id as decimal(28,10)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
